channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sam Altman says Trump could be a ‘visionary leader’ by backing AI infrastructure

item.title: The last time inflation was projected to get worse, this investment was popular. Why it’s ‘unloved’ now.
item.description: A Treasury auction on Thursday pointed to lackluster demand for inflation-protected securities ahead of Trump’s second term.

item.title: A simple plan to fix Social Security? Be very suspicious.
item.description: This proposal would undermine support for the program and delay a real solution

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Inventory Draw Gets Season Started
item.description: Natural gas futures were at their highest level in a year as the EIA reported a small decline in inventories for last week, getting the withdrawal sea...

item.title: Have kids? You’ll need to make an extra $36,000 to reach true financial security.
item.description: Despite the focus on high inflation and interest rates, “a lack of resources, rather than unusually high costs, is the driving factor behind economic ...

item.title: Bitcoin Hits Fresh Record High, Could Soon Reach $100K
item.description: Bitcoin hit a fresh record high and Hargreaves Lansdown said it could soon reach $100,000 on hopes of a crypto-friendly federal stance under Donald Tr...

item.title: Comex Gold Settles Higher, Silver Falls
item.description: Gold settled 0.9% higher, up for a fourth consecutive session, and silver fell 0.1%, down for two consecutive sessions.

item.title: Dow Rises, Alphabet Selloff Weighs on Nasdaq
item.description: The Dow jumped, powered by gains at Salesforce, IBM and Goldman Sachs. The Nasdaq pulled back amid losses at Alphabet.

item.title: Will mortgage rates and home prices go down next year? Your 2025 real-estate road map.
item.description: Will mortgage rates finally fall in 2025? And will it become more affordable to buy — or even rent?

item.title: Nvidia Is on Top But Does It Have Anywhere to Go But Down?
